channel.title: What base?
channel.description: Hi, I have a server (4everscape.com for more info) thats pretty well known, players 24/7 but anyways i was wondering about one thing: As some of you know I have used a cheez base. I am planning to restart (jus for fun, will keep working on the cheez one) on a diff base but i was wondering which 1 you think i should use. Please vote in the poll above saying what you think. The choices are: SpyderScape MythScape NixScape BlakeScape Write a new one from scratch Screw that, dont work on reconstruction ---------------------------------------- Please vote and tell me what you think. Thanks, Justis

item.title: What base?

na i want to write my own version, i already have a popular cheez 80 one

item.title: What base?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hi, I have a server (4everscape.com for more info) thats pretty well known, players 24/7 but anyways i was wondering about one thing:
As some of you know I have used a cheez base. I am planning to restart (jus for fun, will keep working on the cheez one) on a diff base but i was wondering which 1 you think i should use. Please vote in the poll above saying what you think. The choices are:
SpyderScape
MythScape
NixScape
BlakeScape
Write a new one from scratch
Screw that, dont work on reconstruction

Please vote and tell me what you think.
Thanks,
Justis

Read full topic
